answerText: Antigone [10] The twelve maidservants who are punished by hanging for sleeping with the suitors in the Odyssey are given a voice in this prose adaptation of that epic by Margaret Atwood. Its chapter titles include "Helen Ruins My Life."

question: Question: Answer the following about modern adaptations of ancient works, for 10 points each. [10] Jean Anouilh's adaptation of this play contains a scene in which the title character tells her uncle Creon "I am disgusted with your happiness!" The heroine of this Theban play by Sophocles attempts to bury her brother Polynices.
